#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>


int main(){
    int t;
scanf("%d",&t);
   int i;
   long long a[1000001];
       a[0]=1;
    long double sum=0;
     long long temp;
  for(i=1;i<=1000000;i++)
      {sum+=log(i)/log(10);
        temp=(long long)sum;
        a[i]=temp+1;
	}
  while(t--)
{     int n;
    scanf("%d",&n);
      printf("%lld\n",a[n]);





}



return 0;
}
